entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @RahulGandhi Hi @RahulGandhi ..why you people are not raising mishandling of covid19 situation in Telangana .  .here . state. government is doing only 3k-4k test everyday..at the time ..when Corona positive cases are skyrocketing...inspite of doing low testing . still 1000 + cases are coming
